item.title: Drugs n Stuff 288 Equipoise vs Nandrolone â€“Which Steroid Wins for Building Mass? & PED QA
item.description: In this episode of the DNS Podcast, Dave Crosland and Scott McNally dive deep into Nandrolone vs Equipoise, breaking down their anabolic-androgenic ratios, side effects, and best uses for muscle growth. The guys also discuss Tren, Retatrutide, GH, insulin, and modern PED cycles, plus why new steroids arenâ€™t being invented anymore. Packed with insight, experience, and a few laughs along the way!0:00 Nandrolone vs Equipoise | Which Is Better?0:32 Welcome to the DNS Podcast w/ Dave Crosland & Scott McNally3:00 Equipoise vs Nandrolone for Muscle Growth & Strength6:40 Understanding the Anabolic:Androgenic Ratio of EQ and Nandrolone9:00 Is Equipoise Safe for Females?11:30 Using Nandrolone and Equipoise Together â€” Smart or Risky?16:00 How to Manage Nandrolone Side Effects22:45 Support the Show â€“ True Nutrition Code: THINK24:15 Funny Stories & â€œDropping Logsâ€ Segment25:30 Should You Test Tren Before a Contest Cycle?27:50 Do You Really Need Tren to Compete?29:00 Ngenla Long-Acting Growth Hormone Explained33:20 Test / Equipoise / Primo Bulk Cycle â€“ Estrogen Management Tips36:40 DHEA vs 7-Keto DHEA â€“ Whatâ€™s the Difference?37:50 ALT, AST & Creatinine Increases from Training â€“ Whatâ€™s Normal?43:20 Are Anti-Aromatase Compounds Being Unfairly Demonized?45:20 Why Arenâ€™t New Steroids Being Created Anymore?47:40 Myostatin Inhibitors & Gene Doping â€“ The Future of PEDs?51:00 Retatrutide for Contest Prep â€“ Effective or Dangerous?55:00 Retatrutide Dosing Frequency â€“ The Latest Research1:01:00 Generic GH vs Pharma GH â€“ How Much Do You Need?1:03:10 Do You Need Insulin and GH to Be Competitive?1:05:10 Using Insulin During a Fat-Loss Phase1:07:20 Planning the Perfect Cut Cycle1:09:00 Daveâ€™s Selling His Boat!1:10:10 Increased Scar Tissue from Repeated AAS Injections1:12:00 Clearance Times for Common SteroidsğŸ™ Support us on Patreon. The hosts emphasize the evolving perspectives on anabolic use and the increasing demands of users today.

item.title: Drugs N Stuff 241 Superdrol Craze + Best Desert Island Steroid
item.description:
Scott McNally and Dave Crossland delve into the resurgence of Superdrol (Methasterone), discussing its history, usage, and the associated risks and benefits. They explore the differences between testosterone replacement therapy (TRT) and gear cycles, emphasizing the importance of understanding supplements and peptides in bodybuilding. The conversation also touches on training strategies, the significance of rehabilitation, and the management of acne through Roacutane. Throughout the discussion, they highlight the importance of being true to oneself in the fitness journey.

00:00 The Comeback of Superdrol

05:48 Understanding Superdrol: History and Usage

11:52 The Risks and Benefits of Superdrol

18:03 TRT vs. Gear Cycles: A Discussion

23:55 Navigating Bodybuilding Supplements and Peptides

29:45 Training Insights: Volume vs. Intensity

35:58 Rehabilitation and Recovery Strategies

42:01 Acne Management: The Role of Roacutane

47:51 Uncle Dave's Advice: Being True to Yourself
